messages.leyenda: Through this form you can submit a complaint to the authorities of the Chilean State. The presentation of the complaint must comply with the requirements established in the Maritime Labour Convention, regarding the characteristics of the ships to which it applies. In order to register the complaint, the applicant must complete all the fields established in the form.
messages.mensajeOMIVacio: You can not enter a complaint without an IMO number
messages.errorFechaRecalada: The date must be higher to
messages.errorFechaNacimiento: The birth day could not be higher to current date
messages.errorLongitudOMI: The maximun length of IMO number must be 7
messages.errorTipoNave: Requirements does not apply to the ship indicated
messages.errorPesaje: The weighing of the ship must be greater than
messages.errorViajesInternaionales: The type of ship does not meet the international travel condition
messages.errorFechaEmbarcoMayorDesembarco: The boarding date must be less than the landing date
messages.errorFechaEmbarcoMayorActual: The boarding date can not be longer than the current date
